generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane asphalt road with white lane markings and a shoulder, which is clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and green foliage visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: The grassy area to the right of the road, extending into the background, is covered with grass and some soil.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky, visible above the treeline.
- car: Several cars and SUVs are visible in the adjacent lanes, including a black SUV on the left and a silver SUV further ahead.
- bus: A yellow school bus is clearly visible directly ahead in the lane.
- pole: A tall, thin vertical pole is visible on the right side of the road, likely a utility or streetlight pole.
- traffic sign: A green rectangular traffic sign with white text and symbols is visible in the distance on the right side of the road.
- rider: The image shows a vehicle from which the photo is taken, indicating a rider (driver) is present, though not visible as a person.
